messages.Artem Panferov:
üì£  IMPORTANT! UZBEKNEFTEGAZ HACKATHON: DIGITALIZATION OF THE FUEL AND ENERGY COMPLEX

Welcome to the industry hackathon on automation and optimization of processes in the oil, gas, and energy sectors!

üìÖ DATES AND VENUE
May 13 (Day 1): 12:00 to 18:00 ‚Äì Tashkent CAEX
May 14-15 (Days 2-3): 10:00 to 19:00 ‚Äì Bunyodkor Stadium

üë• TEAMS
3-5 people per team
Mandatory: each participant must bring their own laptop

üìã PROGRAM
Day 1: Topic selection, consultations with industry experts
Day 2: Technical implementation, interim presentation
Day 3: Project finalization, jury presentation, awards ceremony

‚è∞ KEY DEADLINES
May 15, 14:00: Final deadline for project submissions
May 15, 14:00-17:00: Final presentations
May 15, 19:30: Awards ceremony and closing

üèÜ PRIZES
Valuable awards from UzbekNefteGaz
Prospects for further collaboration
Special prizes from partner companies

üí° TOPICS
Topic selection will be available on the first day of the hackathon.
Focus areas:
Management (non-production areas)
Hydrocarbon extraction/electricity generation
Processing, storage and logistics of petroleum products
Ecology and safety
Analytics and production management

For all questions, please contact the group administrators.
We look forward to seeing you at the hackathon!

üì£MUHIM! UZBEKNEFTEGAZ HAKATON: YOQILG'I VA ENERGETIKA MAJMUASINING RAQAMLASHTIRILISHI

Neft, gaz va energetika sohasidagi jarayonlarni avtomatlashtirish va optimallashtirish bo'yicha sanoat hakatoniga xush kelibsiz!
üìÖ SANA VA JOY
13-may (1-kun): 12:00 dan 18:00 gacha ‚Äì Toshkent CAEX
14-15-may (2-3-kunlar): 10:00 dan 19:00 gacha ‚Äì Bunyodkor stadioni

üë• JAMOALAR
Har bir jamoada 3-5 kishi
Majburiy: har bir ishtirokchi o'z noutbukiga ega bo'lishi kerak

üìã DASTUR
1-kun: Mavzularni tanlash, soha ekspertlari bilan maslahatlashuvlar
2-kun: Texnik amalga oshirish, oraliq taqdimot
3-kun: Loyihalarni yakunlash, hakamlar hay'atiga taqdimot, mukofotlash marosimi

‚è∞ ASOSIY MUDDATLAR
15-may, 14:00: Loyihalarni topshirishning so'nggi muddati
15-may, 14:00-17:00: Yakuniy taqdimotlar
15-may, 19:30: Mukofotlash va yopilish marosimi

üèÜ MUKOFOTLAR
UzbekNefteGaz dan qimmatli sovg'alar
Kelajakda hamkorlik istiqbollari
Hamkor kompaniyalardan maxsus sovg'alar

üí° MAVZULAR
Mavzularni tanlash hakatonning birinchi kunida mavjud bo'ladi.
Yo'nalishlar:
Menejment (ishlab chiqarishga oid bo'lmagan yo'nalishlar)
Uglevodorod qazib olish/elektr energiyasini ishlab chiqarish
Neft mahsulotlarini qayta ishlash, saqlash va logistikasi
Ekologiya va xavfsizlik
Analitika va ishlab chiqarishni boshqarish

Barcha savollar bo'yicha guruh administratorlariga murojaat qiling.
Sizni hakatonda kutib qolamiz!

messages.Salih Ozgur: I am very happy to participate this event with my friends. Thank you for organizing this event.

messages.O'tkirbek Azamatov:
Hurmatli tadbir tashkilotchilar!
Bizning jamoamiz "Uzbekneftegaz: Raqamlashtirish" xakatonida ishtirok etganidan juda mamnun bo'ldi. Ekspertlar tomonidan berilgan tavsiyalar va 3 kunlik qiziqarli jamoaviy mehnat bizning jamoamizga yaxshi tajriba bo'ldi. Tashkilotchilarga ajoyib imkoniyat yaratib berganlari uchun chin dildan minnatdorchilik bildiramiz. Kelgusidagi ishlariga omad tilaymiz! üëç
